author: Nanako Tsai(Nyanako#0129)
install_msg: Load the cog with `[p]load phishingchecker`. Then use, `[p]phishingchecker` to get started with it.
name: phishingchecker
short: Detect phishing links, and do some actions.
description: Detect phishing links, and do some actions. Phishing-links checking list is provided by discord-phishing-links (<https://github.com/nikolaischunk/discord-phishing-links>)
